ValidationRule.description: Required When Invoicing Case Type/Sub Type = Bad Address/RTS (Collections); Collections/Attempt to Collect; Duplicate Invoice; Misapplied Payment; Missing Payment; Modify Invoice Presentation; Price; Wrong Organization
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(Invoice_Number__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Invoicing', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New') || ISPICKVAL(Status, 'New - Assigned')), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Bad Address'), ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Price_Dispute__c, 'RTS (Col. Letter)') ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Collections'), ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Price_Dispute__c, 'Attempt to Collect') ), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Duplicate Invoice'), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Misapplied Payment'), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Missing Payment'), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Modify Invoice Presentation'), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Price'), ISPICKVAL(Dispute_Issue__c, 'Wrong Organization') ))
